law.text:
The custodian shall transfer in an appropriate manner the custodial property to the minor or to the minor's estate upon the earlier of:
The minor's attainment of age eighteen (18) with respect to custodial property transferred under KRS 385.042 to 385.072; or
The minor's death.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1986.
